name: Personalised Pretty in Pink Print
description:
NEW FROM LOVE LUCY ILLUSTRATION!
A pretty print, personalised with the name of your choice*.

Professionally printed with permanant inks on high quality 300gsm card, taken from a watercolour painting and signed by Love Lucy.

You can choose from either brown or blonde hair, in the option box below. 

Your personalised print will measure 18 x 13cm, a standard size for easy framing (frame not included).

Your print will be carefully sent to you, in a hard-backed envelope, within 14 days of receiving your order. FREE UK DELIVERY!

*IMPORTANT - Instructions for telling me what name(s) you want adding will show on the 'CART' page when placing your order.
Alternatively you can email me at lovelucyillustration@gmail with the name(s) you'd like added to your print.

Love Lucy x

name: Flower Initial Painting
description:
NEW FROM LOVE LUCY ILLUSTRATION!
LIMITED SPACES AVAILABLE

A pretty little flower initial painting, handpainted to order and signed by Love Lucy. 

A gorgeous gift idea for the special little ladies in your life! Great for birthday, christening and bridesmaid gifts.

Your painting will measure 15x15cm, painted on high quality Fabriano watercolour paper using soft and delicate watercolour and gouache paints, with little touches of gold added for a bit of sparkle!

You can choose the hair colour to match that of the little girl in question - please just specify which colour you'd like in the option box below. 

Your painting will be carefully sent to you, in a hard backed envelope, within three weeks of receiving your order. FREE UK DELIVERY!

*IMPORTANT - Instructions for telling me what name(s) you want painting will show on the 'CART' page when you place your order. Alternatively you can email me at lovelucyillustration@gmail.com

Love Lucy x

name: Character Portrait Painting
description:
LIMITED SPACES AVAILABLE!
A cute character portrait painting of your little one(s) painted from your photos. A unique gift for your children, grandparents or indeed yourself!

Please note that the children in your picture will be painted like little characters from a children's book rather than traditional portraits.

Your character portrait will be painted on high quality Fabriano watercolour paper, using soft and delicate watercolour and gouache paints. Signed by Love Lucy.

Your painting will measure 13 x 18cm and be carefully sent to you, tissue wrapped and in a hard backed envelope, within three weeks of receiving your order. FREE UK DELIVERY!

You can choose how many children you'd like in your picture (see the three images attached as examples). Please let me know how many characters you'd like painted in the drop-down menu below (where you'll also see the different prices for the different number of children in the painting).

*IMPORTANT - Please email me 2/3 photos you'd like me to use to paint from. It's important that your photos give a good idea of HAIRSTYLE AND COLOUR, HEIGHT and TYPICAL CLOTHES YOUR CHILDREN LIKE TO WEAR. If you need any guidance on which photos to use, just let me know in the email and I'll help you choose! 

Please email photos to me at:   lovelucyillustration@gmail.com

Love Lucy x

name: Personalised Birthday Card
description:
Birthday cards, designed by Love Lucy, personalised with the name of your choice. 

The cards measure 10.5 x 15cm and are printed on a lovely thick matte card.

Your personalised card will be carefully sent to you, in a hard backed envelope, within seven days of receiving your order. FREE UK DELIVERY!

Please indicate whether you'd like a girl's or boy's design in the option box below.

*IMPORTANT - Instructions for telling me what name(s) you'd like will show on the 'CART' page when you place your order.
Alternatively you can email me at lovelucyillustration@gmail.com with your personalisation requests.

Love Lucy x

name: Personalised New Baby Card
description:
New baby cards, designed by Love Lucy, personalised with the name and date of birth of the new arrival. 

The cards measure 10.5 x 15cm and are printed on a lovely thick matte card.

Ideal for framing afterwards too, for a special little memento.

Your personalised card will be carefully sent to you, in a hard backed envelope, within seven days of receiving your order. FREE UK DELIVERY!

name: Personalised Big Brother Badge
description:
A lovely personalised  badge, for proud new big brothers! Handpainted to order by Love Lucy. All names painted!* 

You can even choose the hair colour to match the big brother! Just choose from the four colours in the drop-down menu below.

Your badge will measure 77mm (3") in diameter. The little character will be painted in watercolour and be protected with a plastic cover.

Your badge will be carefully sent to you tissue-wrapped in a jiffy bag, within 14 working days of receiving your order.

FREE UK DELIVERY!

*IMPORTANT - Please tell me the NAME you'd like by adding a 'Note to seller' on the Paypal checkout page. Alternatively you can email me at lovelucyillustration@gmail with the name(s) you'd like added to your badge.


Love Lucy x

name: 'Little Star' Personalised Badge
description:
A lovely personalised badge for Little Stars! Made to order by Love Lucy Illustration.

A thoughtful and original gift, a great way to let your little ones know you're proud of them, for such things as doing well in their exams or sports day, being a brave little boy or girl - lots of reasons!

At 7.6cm wide, these personalised badges are quite big and eye-catching, and are sure to draw attention to your Little Star.

Your badge will be carefully sent to you tissue and bubble wrapped, in a padded envelope within 14 days of receiving your order and payment. Free UK delivery!

Your unique badge will be personalised with the hair colour and name of the Little Star in question. *IMPORTANT - Please tell me the NAME and HAIR COLOUR you'd like by adding a 'Note to seller' on the Paypal checkout page. Alternatively you can email me at lovelucyillustration@gmail.com with the personalisation details.

Love Lucy x

name: Personalised Wooden Heart Decoration
description:
A lovely little personalised heart decoration handpainted by Love Lucy. All names painted.*

Can be used as a gift tag for an extra special present or as a bedroom decoration.

You can even choose the hair colour to match that of the little girl in question, please specify in the option box below.

Your unique heart is made from lovely smooth birchwood, measuring 7.5cm (widest point) and 0.6cm in depth. It will be handpainted with gouache and finished with a matte varnish for protection. Comes ready to hang with a pretty pink satin ribbon.

Your personalised heart will be carefully sent to you bubble and tissue-wrapped in a padded envelope, within 14 working days of receiving your order.  FREE UK DELIVERY!

*Instructions for telling me what name(s) you'd like will show on the 'CART' page when placing your order. Alternatively you can email me at lovelucyillustration@gmail.com with your personalisation details.

Love Lucy x
